title: Bug 2529 - Open/Close project not always available
description: When both P1 and P2 are selected, the Open Project menu item is available but the Close Project menu item is not.
OB: When both P1 and P2 are selected, the Open Project menu item is available but the Close Project menu item is not.
EB: When both P1 and P2 are selected, either both the Open Project and Close Project menu items should be available or neither one should be enabled.
SR:
1. Launch the application.
2. Select both P1 and P2.
3. Observe the presence of the Open Project and Close Project menu items.
